function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential increase in health inequalities due to severe restrictions to mobility and park use during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Deeper health inequalities and negative impact on poorer residents","Mitigation":"Implement measures to provide equal access to outdoor recreation regardless of economic status","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, urban planning strategies","People":"Poorer residents, residents of affluent neighborhoods","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Wealthier residents less likely to increase their visits to green spaces during the COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Exacerbation of inequality in access to outdoor spaces and physical activity","Mitigation":"Develop programs to encourage equitable use of green spaces, promote awareness of the importance of physical activity","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, public health campaigns","People":"Wealthier and poorer residents","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"},{"Description":"Residents reporting poorer health status during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Potential exacerbation of health disparities and increased risk of illness","Mitigation":"Promote access to urban parks and green spaces, provide resources for maintaining physical activity","Technologies":"Health tracking apps, community health initiatives","People":"Residents of Chengdu, China","Owner":"Local health authorities"}]}
